docs.title: Welcome to B2RUVL
docs.text: B2RUVL is a Blender Addon that serves as a bridge for transferring UVMaps between Blender and external UV mapping applications: RizomUV and Headus UVLayout.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: This tools is designed to streamline the workflow for 3D artists who prefer the powerful UV unwrapping tools of RizomUV or UVLayout but model and render in Blender. With a single click, you can send your mesh to the external application, perform your UV operations, and just as easily get the result back into Blender.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• RizomUV Bridge:
    • Seamless Send/Receive workflow.
    • Remote control capabilities: Unfold, Optimize, Pack, Cut, Weld directly from Blender.
    • Sync selection modes (Seams, Sharp, Crease).
    • Support for multiple UV Sets.
  • Headus UVLayout Bridge:
    • Simple Send/Receive workflow.
    • Support for Subdivision or Poly surfaces.
    • Option to cut based on Blender Sharp Edges.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Check out the Installation guide to get set up.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: Learn more about the available tools in the Features section.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text: Detailed information about configuration options can be found in the Preferences page.

docs.title: Features & Usage
docs.text: B2RUVL exposes its functionality through a panel in the 3D Viewport.

docs.title: Connection Management
docs.text:
• Start RizomUV: Launches the RizomUV application.
  • Close RizomUV: Closes the running RizomUV instance.

docs.title: Data Transfer
docs.text:
• Send UV: Exports the selected object(s) to RizomUV.
  • Get UV: Imports the UVs back from RizomUV to Blender.
    • Note: This updates the existing object's UVs.

docs.title: Remote Operations
docs.text: These operations allow you to trigger actions in RizomUV directly from Blender: * Unfold: Performs an Unfold operation. * Optimize: Optimizes the UV map. * Pack: Packs the UV islands. * Cut: Performs a cut operation on selected edges. * Weld: Welds selected edges.

docs.title: Selection Sync
docs.text: Transfer Blender selection attributes to RizomUV: * Select Seams: Selects edges marked as Seams. * Select Sharp: Selects edges marked as Sharp. * Select Crease: Selects edges with Crease weight. * Select Current: Syncs the current selection from Blender to RizomUV.

docs.title: Utilities
docs.text: • Sync UV Set: Ensures the active UV naming and index matches between Blender and RizomUV.

docs.title: Headus UVLayout Workflow
docs.text:
• Send UV: Sends the selected mesh to Headus UVLayout.
    • Surface Type Option: Choose between Poly or SUBD depending on your mesh type.
    • Sharp Edges: Check "Cut and Drop by sharp edges" to automatically cut along sharp edges.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
1. Download the latest release of the B2RUVL addon as a .zip file.
  2. Open Blender.
  3. Go to Edit > Preferences > Add-ons.
  4. Click Install... and select the downloaded .zip file.
  5. Enable the addon by checking the box next to UV: B2RUVL.

docs.title: Configuration
docs.text:
Before using the addon, you must configure the paths to your external applications.

  1. In the Addon Preferences (expand the B2RUVL entry in the Add-ons list):
  2. RizomUV Setup:
    • Check Use RizomUV.
    • Executable Path: Browse to your RizomUV executable (e.g., C:\Program Files\Rizom Lab\RizomUV 2025.0\rizomuv.exe).
    • Scripts Path: This should default to the addon's internal scripts folder. Unless you have custom scripts, leave this as is.
  3. Headus UVLayout Setup:
    • Check Use UVLayout.
    • Executable Path: Browse to your Headus UVLayout executable.

docs.title: Preferences
docs.text: You can customize the addon behavior in Edit > Preferences > Add-ons > B2RUVL.

docs.title: General
docs.text: • Tab Name: Allows you to rename the category where the panel appears in the Sidebar (N-Panel). Default is B2RUVL.

docs.title: Headus UVLayout Settings
docs.text:
• Use UVLayout: Enables the UVLayout section in the panel.
  • Executable Path: Full path to the headus executable.
  • Export Options:
    • Surface Type: SUBD or Poly.
    • Cut and Drop by sharp edges: Uses Blender's sharp edges to define cuts in UVLayout.

docs.title: RizomUV Settings
docs.text:
• Use RizomUV: Enables the RizomUV section in the panel.
  • Executable Path: Full path to the rizomuv.exe.
  • Scripts Path: Path to the Lua scripts used for automation. Default is the scripts folder inside the addon directory.
  • Connection:
    • Fixed TCP Port: Define a specific port for communication. Set to 0 for automatic assignment.
